presentation.name: Mathias Micheli
presentation.title: Fullstack Developper
presentation.text:
I created this website by myself with AngularJS during a challenge with some friends.
 I will use it as a portfolio. Enjoy it!

cv.text: My name is Mathias Micheli, and I'm actually a full stack developer in alternship. I began coding during my last year of high school, and I was following the STMG Option SIG class. From there, I went in a BTEC SIO Option SLAM to increase my developer's experience. And now I'm following an OpenClassRooms's formation of two years on PHP / Symfony. I would like in the future to be more confident in design and to continue to evolve as a developer.

exp.title-3: Website Les Films en plein air
exp.title-5: BTS SIO : BTEC Higher National Diploma
exp.text-1: First year of BTEC internship, I develop a webapp with Symfony
exp.text-2: Second year of BTEC, I develop a website with WordPress
exp.text-3: First year of master's degree, I develop a website's model with pure HTML, CSS, JS
exp.text-4: First year of master's degree, I develop a website with WordPress
